price: Na watasema: Mola wetu Mlezi! Hakika sisi tuliwat'ii bwana zetu na wakubwa wetu; nao ndio walio tupoteza njia.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّآ أَطَعۡنَا سَادَتَنَا وَكُبَرَآءَنَا فَأَضَلُّونَا ٱلسَّبِيلَا۠
footnotes: Na watasema: Mola wetu Mlezi! Hakika sisi tuliwafuata maraisi wetu, na wakubwa wetu katika kukukataa Wewe na Mtume wako. Na wao ndio wakatutenganisha mbali na Njia Iliyo Nyooka.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqālū rabbanā innā aṭaʿnā sādatanā wakubarāanā fa-aḍallūnā al-sabīlā
